text: Gyanendra Bir Bikram Shah Dev (; born 7 July 1947) was a monarch and the last King of Nepal, reigning from 2001 to 2008. His second reign began after the 2001 Nepalese royal massacre. . ==References== ==Other websites== * *King of Nepal is stoned by crowd. title: Gyanendra of Nepal
